casebody.data:
GEORGE S. ST. JOHN, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. SALMON SKINNER, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Freedman and Curtis, JJ.

Decided November 2, 1872. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiff in an action to recover money loaned to defendant. A. H. Reavy, for appellant. W. H. Van Cott, for respondent. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Freedman, J., concurred in by Curtis, J.
